website_summaries.verdict: One of the best premium stereo choices that upgrades much more than just the sound in your car.
pros: Functions as a complete infotainment system for cars that lack more advanced features and entertainment capabilities
Offers Apple CarPlay and Android Auto connectivity along with voice control
cons: Only compatible with cars that have a double din space in the dashboard

customer_reviews.title: 2001 Honda Civic LX install
customer_reviews.text: I really like this radio. Installation was about 4 hours. Things needed for install: Backup camera (optional) Video cable for backup camera (optional) USB plug for dash, see photos (optional) Honda Civic adapter for wiring Solder and flux with soldering gun (recommended way of making wiring harness) Electric tape Dremel (heavily modified faceplate adapter for fit I wanted-I removed all of the face plate adapters backing) Faceplate adapter for Honda Civic I also added device that charges passenger iPhones where the cigarette lighter used to be
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. Simply brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best $400 I've spent on my car. Easy to install and easy to set up and use. It's a beautiful looking unit that works really well. One of the highlights, no more car charger because the phone charges while plugged into the unit! Simply the best and most logical way to get music, navigation and phone into an older car. Bravo Sony, bravo. You get a standing ovation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright and responsive screen and
customer_reviews.text: I did a long search for an aftermarket carplay device. My requirements were pretty simple but each unit I researched had limitations including this Sony (resistive touch). I needed a device with physical buttons, affordable with a bright and responsive screen and the Sony has it all. I was particularly worried about the resistive touch but I am glad I got this. I had it professionally installed in an 09 Hyundai Tuscon with a backup camera and they are working perfectly. I live in Cape Town and the sun is very bright in summer but I can still see my screen. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase and hope it continues to perform at this level.
customer_reviews.author: Coretta

customer_reviews.title: Volume knob rules!  Great user interface!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 1 year old $500 Pioneer with this. I couldn't stand not having a volume knob, so there's that. Also, the user interface is outstanding. Nice simple and functional software - kind of like Apple does things - not gimmicky. One thing I like is there are good shortcuts - including a quick way to shut the screen off for night driving. It comes back on as soon as you hit a button. I also liked being able to shut off the silly guide lines on the reverse backup screen. Hooked mine up to a power amp and a sub and it sounds absolutely great. Outstanding unit.
customer_reviews.author: WuLiMaster

customer_reviews.title: everything is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just before a 2800 mile road trip. I also bought the PAC RP4.2-TY11 adapter kit so that I could retain the factory JBL system in my ‘03 4Runner. This receiver was a straight forward install and worked very well the entire trip. I’m sure there are other apps that work with CarPlay but I only used Apple Maps, Spotify, Audible, Phone, and Message. Google Maps does not work with CarPlay, obviously and unfortunately, but it still piped the audio from it through the stereo. The icons are big, everything is easy to use, and I have another vehicle with hands free capability.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great for Apple Car Play!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a couple months ago, got it installed and very pleased with the appearance, performance, interface. I purchased the unit for CarPlay -- and that works AWESOME! All phone features, music, phone are really great. Added the optional unit that ties in with my steering wheel controls -- all worked perfectly! Unfortunately, the FM Stations stopped coming in clearly a few weeks ago, so I tore out the dash and checked to see if the antenna lead had shaken loose. Sadly - nope, AM works but FM I get no reception for any stations, just weak signal and static. Any ideas on why the FM stopped working? If the FM worked its and easy 5 star unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gibs

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great and reliable head unit
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great and reliable head unit. Been installed for about 1 year. Never had an issue with it, and was easy to install. The unit behind the screen is only one DIN in height, which makes shoehorning into cavities designed for a 1 or 1.5 DIN unit a little easier. I installed this in a 2006 Jeep Liberty using an aftermarket 2 DIN bezel. This install did require some cutting and bending, but no fault of the head unit, my jeep wasn't designed to accommodate a non factory radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacks basic features I got from a Pioneer for half the price.
customer_reviews.text: This stereo isn't terrible, but it has some real issues. My biggest dislike is that it doesn't connect to or even store more than one bluetooth phone at a time. This is very annoying because my wife and I take turns driving the car and we have to pair every time. My other car's cheaper Pioneer can do this just fine. Also button color can not be changed from white. Additional, there is no Aux input port.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Y.

customer_reviews.title: Apple Car-play is more amazing than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This unit is incredible! I put this in a 2008 Nissan Frontier, and it makes the truck seem new! Apple Car-play is more amazing than I expected, and the screen for the backup camera is very nice. Also, the microphone for the hands free functions is incredibly clear. I have been told that there is absolutely no echo on the other end of the call.
customer_reviews.author: OSUBHJ

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Android Auto
customer_reviews.text: Awesome inexpensive way to put full navigation music and phone /text by voice in my 2006 Wrangler TJ. Minus one star because the volume knob is annoyingly small. However I found that a thumb grip extender from one of my Ps4 controllers fits perfectly over it. A little rubber cement and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Realist

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.. Radio reception is not as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad .. Radio reception is not as good as OEM (this was a big factor for me); android auto has some hiccups I need to figure out; apple interface seems to be more reliable
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Kappa

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a musician, naturally I'm a sonic snob. This unit provides a very solid range of controls, paired with a good set of speakers and you have a very decent set up you can write home about. The user interface is clean and easy, the screen is a smooth operator and the resolution is better than you expect. I want one for my car now. Hands down, the best quality unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JamesG

customer_reviews.title: Boot up time is quick and touch screen is responsive!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty snappy for what I expected. Boot up time is about 10s which is great. I use it for android auto which is nice. While this model is limited to bluetooth only it sounds fine unless you're an audiophile, to which I say you should worry more about driving on the road than the difference between those lows and highs.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to the 21st Century
customer_reviews.text: Welcome to the 21st century. I replaced my stock radio in my Chevy Silverado, man what an upgrade. Only head unit available with Apple Car Play under $500.
customer_reviews.author: TheOther

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I had the unit professionally installed and was completely worth it. I am infatuated with how awesome it is, and that I have the legendary Apple Car Play in my 30 year old Toyota. The touch screen is nothing shy of amazing, extremely responsive. The software updates don’t require much thought and are effortless. Sony has out done themselves and created a head unit that cuts out all the B.S. you don’t need for a good price. The volume knob was a MUST and great that I chose this.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Schillereff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit. Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good radio unit if you want to upgrade your older car with newer tech. I have not had any problems with connecting my devices to it and it runs flawlessly. I think this is one of the best radio out there for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen feedback is very good. Interface is simple and intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as you would expect. Touchscreen feedback is very good. Interface is simple and intuitive. Soind quality and customization is very good. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: RGARCH

customer_reviews.title: Device is great, but Sony's installation instructions are terrible
customer_reviews.text: Device is great, but Sony's installation instructions are terrible. If you DIY, prepare to spend time researching online. Their labels for SWC controls were plain wrong, had to test with a multimeter to figure out how to wire it, after spending too much time wondering why it didn't work right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: I bought this, and it recently just started turning ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, and it recently just started turning off while I've been driving... It's perfectly outside of the return time too. BEWARE OF THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Holmes

customer_reviews.title: An Easy Choice
customer_reviews.text: When browsing multiple head unit options in a store, it became clear that the XAV-AX100 had one of the best displays and UI experiences out of the many different options. I mainly use this unit for the CarPlay functionality which seems to work great for my commutes. I like the sleek, minimalist design, but do wish there was a USB port on the front for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Granner

customer_reviews.title: Best you’ll get from Sony
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best radio that you will get from Sony. My biggest complaint is that the custom background image is strangely dark compared to the other default wallpapers. Sometimes as I seek for other radio stations, I’ve noticed sometimes that it will skip over stations that have perfect audio( maybe that’s just my antenna on my car but I thought it was worth noteing)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Touchscreen is easily the worst ever. It is unresponsive to all but the most forceful touches. Tuner is poorly designed and far to easy to clear and override saved channels. Android auto connections randomly drop out mid use and only some devices are supported (this is a head unit limitation, not Android auto).
customer_reviews.author: Doug Klein

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first double din stereo I have ever owned and I really like it. I really like having the navigation big and right where I can see it. Blue tooth connects very well and I really like the Carplay features.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: American FM/AM Spec radio! Cannot be changed!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Everything is very nice. But the radio is US Spec which means no FM or AM radio for me and is a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Shumayal

customer_reviews.title: loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving mine so far!! Very easy. So bust it I never had touchscreen radio before so I'm behind time but this is really good for my android. I just ok Google this ok Google that and boom it's done nah meen. Str8 up and down The sound is dope too! I have no complaints so far!!
customer_reviews.author: aloha Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2014+ Harleys
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in my 2015 Road Glide. Just wished it was waterproof
customer_reviews.author: F. Peckler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is pretty great OS is amazing both apple play and android auto work well sunlight makeit a lil hard to see but to be expected the only on I have is the plastic does scratch easily and every now and then it's a lil glitchy
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one yet. Others were very disappointing. Better than the OEM in most vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzy

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent. So glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. So glad I purchased this. Makes a huge difference with the navigation and air play. Kids love it also.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for my Ford F150! Love it. But the time does not keep. Lasts about 3 days then it changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Sony blew it out of the park !
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this headunit, it sounds wayyy better than any car stereo i’ve heard and for the price, ya can’t beat it. Highly recommended and shipped faster than I expected
customer_reviews.author: martha martin

customer_reviews.title: Gray screen
customer_reviews.text: The buttons wore off fairly quickly. 2 years after purchase, it now only shows a gray screen. Zero support from seller or sony so at this price pointi would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Cole

customer_reviews.title: Best deck I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Love this deck. Wish I could turn the warning off on startup. No complaints otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: It is a great head unit
customer_reviews.text: It is a great head unit. I put it in my 2012 Honda Civic coupe. Just need two adapters to match with the factory connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Htian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great experience! Solve the apple map on the iPhone too small issue to me.
customer_reviews.author: Wenpin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sony hit it out of the park with this head unit. Not only does it look stock but it's super easy to install. I installed this in a 2008 nissan xterra and it uses mounting brackets the old radio used. Love this head unit so so much worth the money. I will post pics when I get on PC. Mobile Amazon doesn't let me upload pics for reviews for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel.C

customer_reviews.title: the UI is clean and minimal (that's a VERY good thing) The best thing about it is that unlike ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a SPECTACULAR Android Auto headunit, the screen is responsive, the UI is clean and minimal (that's a VERY good thing) The best thing about it is that unlike most other headunit in the market that support AA/Carplay, it looks like it was designed for adults, not 12 year olds that think rainbow LEDs and tacky designs will make their cars look cool. Get it. get it now
customer_reviews.author: Diegoale2000

customer_reviews.title: and music sounds great. I've also occasionally used it to play MP3s ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it primarily with Android Auto. Works well for that purpose. Screen is responsive, and music sounds great. I've also occasionally used it to play MP3s from a USB stick, which works well. I bought this one mostly due to the rotary volume knob which, while it is kinda small, isn't so clumsy to use as you'd guess. It's alright. Not very impressed by the AM/FM radio interface: I feel they could've done better work with handling the channel memory slots.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: fit and finish screen color and brightness both excellent. turns my 1997 car into a modern vehicle
customer_reviews.text: top drawer. want to update you old deck ?? this is where it is at one caveat must use apple music for full integration. install is no different than any other h/u. fit and finish screen color and brightness both excellent. turns my 1997 car into a modern vehicle. no
customer_reviews.author: rube

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this head unit
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this head unit. Only complaint is not being able to have my USB and my iPhone plugged in at the same time. Also the having to click the OK safety button at start up. The AMP built in is impressive for my door speakers and the EQ is quality.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddictedInKentucky

customer_reviews.title: Great carplay unit, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for updating older vehicles... I installed in a 2001 911 Turbo, looks as good as a factory unit with the right fit-kit. iPhone allows full streaming music and navigation, far better than most integrated nav units at a fraction of the cost. I personally really like having a real volume knob instead of touch-controls for volume, same for 'next/last' for skipping tracks. I put a Kenwood Carplay in a previous car (Sony unit wasn't out yet) and I much prefer the screen, knob, and user interface of this less expensive Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Paul From Boulder

customer_reviews.title: The warning message will drive you insane
customer_reviews.text: The unit makes you dismiss a "For your safety" message telling you not to get distracted every time you start your car. You even have to dismiss it before you can change the radio station using your steering wheel controls. So the message is distracting in itself. It drives me so insane it makes me regret buying this unit altogether. On a more minor gripe, it takes something like 15 seconds to boot up which can get annoying when you want to set something before setting off. I like most other things about the unit, but the warning message really destroys my enjoyment of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Olso5502

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Apple carplay stops working at time and wont show unless you factory reset the stereo
customer_reviews.author: Dylan R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great except you have to plug in to use android auto.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SWC wire make it easy to setup harness
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Subaru STI limited 2011 perfectly. SWC wire make it easy to setup harness. Installed with Sony XAV-AX100, Axxess ASWC-1, Esky 170°. Android Auto is awesome. DIY save some money, not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: (Was) Pleasantly perfect (until firmware and iOS updates)
customer_reviews.text: 10/2018: Ended up being user error. I've since bought two more of these. Still way better than any car-maker offering (at least on used cars pre-2016). 1/2017 update: iOS 11.2.2 completely broke what the Sony firmware update made unstable. Original: Renewed my faith in aftermarket audio. After three decades of continuous crap from Pioneer and the likes, this deck blew my mind, particularly because it let me interface directly with my Apple product. It didn't try to do too much or get in the way. Apple Carplay isn't perfect, but it's pleasant and works. It's not stupid flashing digital LED lights forming letters like my calculator from high school (in the 90s).
customer_reviews.author: 8b63vI4aSp88ZVq32a2qFs3wOutHO6

customer_reviews.title: This would be perfect except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: This would be perfect except for one thing. When reversing, the reverse camera should automatically come on instead of having to press the reverse camera button. All my others cars dot this automatically. Other than that this is a great unit. Having real buttons for volume, fast forward and fast reverse are a big advantage over competing units.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn N.

customer_reviews.title: It gets annoying. Because of the loading screen you always running ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets annoying. Because of the loading screen you always running into it. And there's no way to turn it off and like it stop you for doing thing like my back up cam . To use it I'll have to wait till the ok pops up press it the. See what's behind me . And it's so. Inconvenience . End up not even using it . So times
customer_reviews.author: Michael j.

customer_reviews.title: Worst part about it is that when I called Sony ...
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do, don't buy this unit. Worst part about it is that when I called Sony for help on this unit shortly after I bought it, they pretty much laughed me off and referred me back to the people who installed the unit. I was having issues with the unit itself, NOT the installation. Definitely never buying a Sony head unit again. Might never buy a Sony product again.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This radio is "NOT" a true double din indash. Expect a regular 2 and 3/4 inch backing in this radio when you get it. Although it was not what I expected when it made it to me the radio still works nicely but could use a few upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on this purchase as we had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Youngs

customer_reviews.title: Great Stereo with nice user interface
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, and it works great, I also bought the Rerii 3ft USB 3.0 Flush Mount Cable  in order to properly route the USB port from the back of the radio into the dash, and connected a Samsung Fast Charger into the second USB Port, it looks great and Android Auto / Car Play works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: espereir

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to get Carplay in an older vehicle...
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit; got it primarily for Carplay and installed easily enough and works as expected. Quite an upgrade from factory radio. Installed in Honda CRV (2007 - 2011) with CRUX SWRHN-62B harness and HONK817 dash kit. Connected crux harness to sony harness with Posi-Twists, which were really simple to use. For posterity, the wiring was pretty straightforward. For the parking brake I just wired to ground instead of figuring out how to wire it to the break and sony didn't seem to care (I haven't tested with video, but never plan to watch it on this unit anyway).
customer_reviews.author: viaChicago

customer_reviews.title: Terrible FM reception
customer_reviews.text: FM reception went from great with factory radio to horrible with this Sony Unit. It's 2018 and we should have solved the FM thing buy now and also HD radio should be standard at this price point. Android auto still needs some work. I have not seen any firmware updates to this unit. Also be aware that the volume knob is very small and also might make for a tight fit in some installs. Installed into a 2008 Dodge Avenger and I had to modify the adapters slightly for knob to stick out far enough so you could get your fingers around it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney From St. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to power up for the backup camera to be useful.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! I use most of the features, including backup camera. I wish it powered up quicker. It takes too long to power up to make the backup camera worth while. Apple car play is great! I use this the most and have no issues with this portion. In car calling is great too. I never have complaints about being able to hear me. Overall I am very pleased with the unit, giving it 5 stars, but I do wish it powered up quicker for the backup camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy DIY -> great fit -> elegant result
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you understand what else is required with this purchase for avalon 2001 (toyota 2000-2004 group) i needed: -plastic installation kit to fit your vehicle dashboard -connectors from your vehicle stereo port (about $5) -butt connectors for splicing wires together Chances are you will be splicing together wires. See youtube for installing aftermarket stereo, specifically wiring. Specifically color-to-color splicing. Specifically blue and blue-white wires. ANDROID AUTO requires GREEN PARKING break wire to be grounded - DO NOT IGNORE it. Most common solution (aside from 1000 idiot youtbers) just to screw it around any metal part of the stereo chassy thus forever grounding the wire.
customer_reviews.author: by dnkz

customer_reviews.title: Good stereo with Bluetooth, CarPlay and backup camera connection
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation in my Toyota. It did need a wiring harness adaptor. Good sound quality, but not quite as good as the original high end Toyota radio. Bluetooth works well as does the Apple CarPlay connection and backup camera. As with any radio the installation time was 4+ hours. The deciding factor for this radio was the physical volume button so I don’t have to look at the screen when adjusting. Downside- only one USB port, slightly smaller screen than others. Neither of these are significant.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Head Unit
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, nice screen. Android Auto is worth every penny, can send and respond to texts with my voice safely. Enormously difficult to install, even more so with steering wheel controls and backup camera. Need multiple adaptors. Might be worth paying for professional installation, took probably 8 hours total over two days and that is with someone with 10+ years experience installing car audio.
customer_reviews.author: Ezraindustries

customer_reviews.title: Great product, however
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however, CarPlay doesn't automatically connect all the time. I would say it connects 95% of the time. Otherwise, I'm happy with it as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This Stereo is amazing. I had to change my 2015 Camaro stereo after it got broken and I update the whole thing with this item. I am an amateur related to this kind of processes but following the instructions that came with it and a couple of youtube(the instructions master place) I was able to do it and it looks pretty original. Even my wheel controls works with it. The installation process took me a whole weekend but it was pretty fun.
customer_reviews.author: ebr319

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a few months
customer_reviews.text: I installed this Sony XAV-AX100 a few months ago and it has been working well. I few days ago, I noticed some extremely loud pops/bangs from the speakers. This morning the screen lit up, presented a weird pattern and failed to boot up to the User Interface. I contacted support who suggested a factory reset - this did not help. The screen is still lit even though the ignition is switched off so it seems to be terminally broken. Also the battery in my car is being slowly run flat as the unit never switches off. I'm really surprised that a Sony unit would fail this quickly :-|
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: I am now more than happy with the look
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for months now. It does everything I need it to do. Doesn't look out of place in my older Subaru. I did have to slightly modify trim pieces during installation in order to achieve the flush fit I wanted as its size was not a direct match to the factory stereo. A pain? Yes. However, I am now more than happy with the look, fit, performance, and ease of use of this product. I would prefer a completely wireless connection but until we all have induction chargers in our cars or phone batteries advance, I would be forced to have the phone plugged in for power anyways.
customer_reviews.author: RAR

customer_reviews.title: Work much better than the system in my 2017 Chevy Silverado
customer_reviews.text: It's fast, responsive, and does everything I could ask. Work much better than the system in my 2017 Chevy Silverado, voice control work just as you're android phone does with Google to control calls, texting, and navigation, even ask it the weather.. I'm in love. Screen is a bit small and I wish it had a glad screen more like a phone ore tablet but the resolution is good and it works with polarized glasses also better than the new gm screen.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wadle

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Love android auto. Wish it was a bit faster (slow load times - not sure if it's my phone or the head unit). The volume knob is too small on the head unit. Also, you get an annoying safety warning you have to click OK every single time you turn on the car. Other than that, it seems to be a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blankenbeckler

customer_reviews.title: Great Android Auto head unit
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I really like the audio settings you can make with this unit, the balance/fader is nice, as well as the EQ's available, and the DSO feature really makes a difference, my speakers are in the door kind of low but with this feature turned on it brings the sound up high so it really feels like you are immersed in the sound. Cons: not many to speak of, but the unit does take a good 10-15 seconds to boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Bookman

customer_reviews.title: glare can be an issue
customer_reviews.text: installed this in my 2016 Ford Mustang with a SCOSCHE ITCFD05B 2015-Up Ford Mustang Integrated Touchscreen Control ITC 2.0 Solution Dash Kit. The glare can be an issue on bright days, and the backup camera doesn't work properly in alternating light, but that might be the dash kit. Aside from that, works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: One Of The Best!
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought it, it was $500 (wish would have waited for sale). 6 months later still working awesome. Apple Car Play & Android Auto are really the future of car phone integration. Lack of AUX cable will turn some people off, but for me that was okay. Awesome radio.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Melgar

customer_reviews.title: Sony build a winner, love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This Sony system is wonderful, installation is easy and everything worked perfectly the first time. Mic, remote, and other bits were all neatly packaged and worked flawlessly straight out of the box. The stereo does exactly what you think it will do, sounds great and hooks right up to Car Play seamlessly every time. Best purchase I've made in some time!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great aftermarket option for CarPlay or android auto
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Screen is nice size and is matte so it’s easy to see in sunlight. It has a volume knob and actual buttons - which is so nice compared to others with capacitive buttons. Comes with a remote, USB extension and mic for calls and Siri. I use an iPhone and it works great with it so far. CarPlay is nice. Haven’t been able to try android auto. UI is simple to navigate and is quick.
customer_reviews.author: IanA

customer_reviews.title: Big Fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this head unit. I drive a lot for work and the temptation to text can be great when the commute drags. This forces me to keep my phone down but also let's me use Nav, make calls and control the music with my voice. Install was a breeze with the right harness.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of these. The first went when I sold my Mazda. I ordered the second for my current vehicle. Android auto was the big draw for me. Have been having some connection issues with phone calls with this second unit but unsure if it's my phone or the installation job.
customer_reviews.author: Anan

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but it's the best after market stereo there is! The screen is incredibly responsive and there are no glitches and the sound quality/volume output is seriously unbelievable. With your phone plugged in via USB, I don't think it's possible to get any better sound integrity in a car stereo for anywhere this price. You owe it to yourself to splurge on this
customer_reviews.author: walt

customer_reviews.title: I love this car audio system
customer_reviews.text: I love this car audio system. It may not have all the features other systems may have, but it works smoothly with my iPhone. I love the manual volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, responsive touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Using it with Apple Car Play and it is seamless. Easy install, responsive touch screen, attractive interface (when not in Car Play mode), good quality sound from the included Bluetooth microphone, image from the reverse camera (not included) looks great. The nag screen is annoying and I hope Sony makes it optional with a firmware upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: CUbuff

customer_reviews.title: Great CarPlay receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty please with it after 6 months. Screen catches a bit of glare and it would have been nice if it was capacitive touch instead of resistive. Great value for retrofitting CarPlay. I only use it in CarPlay mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apple Car Play
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star but I can not receive any am/fm channels. Bluetooth,Apple car play great
customer_reviews.author: Robin Carnwath

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but could be better. Having to push a button that you won’t watch movies when driving gets old fast. Wish I could adjust Siri volume
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio! Easy to install, the screen is very nice quality and adds some nice value to my truck
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Much cheaper to buy it here and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. We love it. Much cheaper to buy it here and install it yourself versus CarToys.
customer_reviews.author: RedTink

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like this unit
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this unit...I just replaced my factory stereo and the changes in the sound quality is remarkable
customer_reviews.author: renaldo melendez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Clean appearance. Works flawlessly and fast. Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Cordes

customer_reviews.title: No easy way to turn off, just one USB input on back and no memory card slot
customer_reviews.text: 1. Description does not say anywhere there is only one USB input on the back of the unit. It has no inputs on the front. For headunit that does not take CDs it’s unacceptable to have no memory card slot and just one usb 2. Do you think that big button on the front turns the unit on and off? Nope! It’s for “options”. To turn it off you have to press smallish recessed button and hold it for some time... These are showstoppers for me, sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gennady

customer_reviews.title: Install was super easy, and the car play works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for and more ! Install was super easy, and the car play works flawlessly ! What I didn't realize is that it had a crossover, eq and sounds better than the alpine I had currently installed ! I can't be happier with my purchase of this awesome Sony Carplay unit !
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would like the ability to change/adjust Apple CarPlay volume for ring and messages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product. Looks like it came with the car.
customer_reviews.author: nazeli

customer_reviews.title: Great aftermarket unit with lots of bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Installed with steering wheel module to retain steering wheel controls and so far everything is working great. Initially I had a different brand unit for navigation but in many ways this head unit is far better. The Bluetooth works well with my phone for calls and streaming and the sound is just fantastic even with my stoc speakers. Really blew me away with the quality. IMO it's worth it just for that and android auto completes the deal
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice head unit...touch screen seems very responsive, carplay works great, sound is good and installation was fairly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T.

customer_reviews.title: A problem unit.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received, the rca front output didn't work. I am currently waiting on Monday to return for replacement/exchange. Otherwise it was a glitchy unit. when listening to FM, it kept switching to camera input and saying nothing was there. Hopefully the next one will be acceptable. I also updated the firmware before I installed it in the car, so this one just seemed to have problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody.

customer_reviews.title: Nag screen now goes away
customer_reviews.text: Updating review. Sony finally addressed the warning nag screen issue. Now it is a reasonable piece of tech.
customer_reviews.author: The customer is right!

customer_reviews.title: Back Up Camera is not Automatic!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the unit. The camera back up is not automatic you have to hit rear camera button on the radio to back up.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo NYC

product_meta.title: Sony XAV-AX100 6.4" Car Play/Android Auto Media Receiver with Bluetooth,black
product_meta.description: Edition:Receiver OnlyGet help from your smartphone on the road, without taking your hands off the wheel. Apple CarPlay and Android Auto let you get directions, communicate with your contacts, and control audio playback using voice commands.1,2 Powerful 4 x 55 W amplification makes music sound clear and dynamic, even at high volumes.
feature_bullets: Voice control with Apple Car Play and Android Auto
Control and view everything with the 6.4" touch screen.Tuner features preset:FM18/AM12
Get powerful sound with the 4 x 55 W Dynamic Reality Amp. Audio Level Adjustment: Yes (-8 dB to +18 dB)
Create virtual speakers on your dashboard with the Dynamic Stage Organizer
Ergonomic rotary dial for distraction-free operation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
